entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
